ValidationRule.description: VR to restrict some kind of characters on Name field
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( CONTAINS(Name, '~') , CONTAINS(Name, '!') , CONTAINS(Name, '@') , CONTAINS(Name, '#') , CONTAINS(Name, '$') , CONTAINS(Name, '%') , CONTAINS(Name, '^') , CONTAINS(Name, '&') , CONTAINS(Name, '*') , CONTAINS(Name, '(') , CONTAINS(Name, ')') , CONTAINS(Name, '`') , CONTAINS(Name, ';') , CONTAINS(Name, '<') , CONTAINS(Name, '>') , CONTAINS(Name, ':') , CONTAINS(Name, '?') , CONTAINS(Name, ',') , CONTAINS(Name, '[') , CONTAINS(Name, ']') , CONTAINS(Name, '{') , CONTAINS(Name, '}') , CONTAINS(Name, '"') , CONTAINS(Name, '/') , CONTAINS(Name, '\\') , CONTAINS(Name, '|') , CONTAINS(Name, '.'), CONTAINS(Name, "'") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format name. Name Can't be with any of these symbols ~ ! @ # $ % ^ & * ( ) ` ; < > : ? , [ ] { } ' " / \ | .
